title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Jerusalem
content:
Photo submitted by Schlomi Deutch of their ride near Jerusalem. We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note that public spaces and parks may have restrictions or […]
